page.description: Specify the button text. You can use field placeholders in the text. For example: Button for {Lastname}. Note: The placeholders are case-sensitive.

section.description: Here the ContactName field is inserted into the button text using a placeholder. The name of the field on the right is simply copied into curly brackets inside the Button text property.
The resulting view in Live Preview. Each of the rows now has a distinct button text.
